mapper.select: SELECT * FROM mbd_qna ORDER BY qna_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mbd_qna (qna_idx, user_idx, qna_cat, qna_title, qna_contents, qna_date) VALUES (mbd_qna_seq.nextval, #{user_idx}, #{qna_cat}, #{qna_title}, #{qna_contents}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE mbd_qna SET qna_reply = #{qna_reply} WHERE qna_idx = #{qna_idx}
UPDATE mbd_qna SET qna_title = #{qna_title}, qna_contents = #{qna_contents} WHERE qna_idx = #{qna_idx} AND user_idx = #{user_idx}
UPDATE mbd_qna SET qna_reply_check =1, qna_reply = #{ qna_reply }, qna_reply_date = sysdate WHERE qna_idx = ${qna_idx}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM mbd_qna WHERE qna_idx= #{ qna_idx }
